scripts.db:touchy: [ ! -d ./.wrangler ] && pnpx wrangler d1 execute printy-mobile-d1-database --local --command='SELECT 1' || true
scripts.dev: pnpm run db:migrate:cf:local && pnpx wrangler dev src/index.ts --port 8930
scripts.deploy: pnpm run db:migrate:cf:remote && pnpx wrangler deploy --minify src/index.ts
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm run db:migrate:cf:remote:prod && pnpx wrangler deploy --minify src/index.ts --env production
scripts.deploy:preview: pnpm run db:migrate:cf:remote:preview && pnpx wrangler deploy --minify src/index.ts --env preview
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:migrate:cf:local: yes | pnpx wrangler d1 migrations apply printy-mobile-d1-database --local
scripts.db:migrate:cf:remote: yes | pnpx wrangler d1 migrations apply printy-mobile-d1-database --remote
scripts.db:migrate:cf:remote:preview: yes | pnpx wrangler d1 migrations apply printy-mobile-d1-database --remote --env preview
scripts.db:migrate:cf:remote:prod: yes | pnpx wrangler d1 migrations apply printy-mobile-d1-database --remote --env production
scripts.db:migrate:cf:remote:staging: yes | pnpx wrangler d1 migrations apply printy-mobile-d1-database --remote --env staging
scripts.dev:reset: pnpx wrangler d1 delete printy-mobile-d1-database && pnpx wrangler d1 create printy-mobile-d1-database
scripts.dev:db: pnpx wrangler d1 migrations apply printy-mobile-d1-database --local
